name: Basic Successful Analysis
description: Standard resume and job ad with expected successful analysis output

input.resume_text:
John Doe
Software Engineer with 5 years experience

Experience:
Senior Software Engineer at TechCorp (2020-2024)
- Led development of microservices architecture using Python and Docker
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 40%
- Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews

Software Engineer at StartupXYZ (2018-2020)
- Built RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express
- Developed frontend components with React and TypeScript
- Collaborated with product team to define requirements

Skills:
Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Docker, AWS, Git, Agile methodologies
input.job_ad:
Senior Full Stack Developer

We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer to join our growing team.

Requirements:
- 4+ years of software development experience
- Strong proficiency in Python and JavaScript
- Experience with React or similar frontend frameworks
- Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
- Experience with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
- Strong understanding of RESTful API design
- Experience with version control systems (Git)
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills

Nice to have:
- Experience with microservices architecture
- CI/CD pipeline experience
- Mentoring or leadership experience
- Agile/Scrum experience

suggested_experiences.suggestion: Gain hands-on experience with Kubernetes for container orchestration
suggested_experiences.implementation: Set up a local Kubernetes cluster and deploy microservices

suggested_experiences.suggestion: Explore Google Cloud Platform or Azure services
suggested_experiences.implementation: Complete cloud certification or build projects on alternative platforms

suggested_experiences.suggestion: Lead a Scrum team or obtain Scrum Master certification
suggested_experiences.implementation: Take on Scrum Master responsibilities in current role
